text: The 2000 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship World Champion Andreas Jonsson get qualification to 2000 Speedway Grand Prix Challenge. ==World final== *August 27, 2000 * Gorzów Wielkopolski, Edward Jancarz Stadium ==See also== 2000 World I J Wor Category:Speedway competitions in Poland
title: 2000 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship
